data.AMEX_Reg_Password_Tooltip: Your Password:</br>*Must be different from your User ID.</br>*Must contain 8 to 20 characters, including one letter and number.</br>*May include the following characters: %,&, _, ?, #, =, -.</br>*Your new password cannot have any spaces and will not be case sensitive
data.AMEX_Reg_User_ID_Tooltip: Your User ID should:</br>*Contain 5 to 20 characters - at least one letter (not case sensitive).</br>*Contain no spaces or special characters (e.g., &, >, *, $, @).</br>
